job.title: CNO Analyst Programmer III
job.description: raytheon technologies is a premier engineering company which provides technical solutions in software development and systems engineering that address security challenges and strengthen our customers raytheon technologies hires industryleading professionals and we treat them like industryleading professionals we bring exceptional talent to an array of missions that includes computer network operations vulnerabilities characterization information assurance and emerging technologies to expand cybersecurity solutions job description work developing and maintaining low level application and operating system projects related to software protection and hostbased personal security tools projects will be undertaken in small teams with close coordination with customers to quickly enhance capabilities or resolve issues in existing tools requirements years experience with c programming years experience with advanced debugging on windows and linux systems experience with windows and linux apis posix win win native experience developing custom network protocols experience with socket programming on windows and linux familiarity analyzing x and x assembly familiarity with subversion security clearance qualified applicants must have active tssci with poly required education bs in computer science electrical engineering or a related discipline raytheon is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion creed sex sexual orientation gender orientation gender identity national origin disability or protected veteran status
